snippet: Jon Niese shut down the Braves through eight innings, but they nearly came back after scoring four runs off the Mets’ bullpen in the ninth.
abstract: New York Mets defeat the Atlanta Braves, 6-5.
lead_paragraph: Jon Niese shut down the Braves through eight innings, but they nearly came back after scoring four runs off the Mets’ bullpen in the ninth.

headline.seo: Niese Leads Mets, Who Hang On vs. Braves
headline.main: Niese Provides Steadying Hand, but Mets Keep Him on His Toes
headline.print_headline: Niese Provides Steadying Hand, But Mets Keep Him on His Toes
